message: Let's split the money fairly, Bob. A 55/45 split seems reasonable for us to both benefit.
I think I deserve a bit more, 60/40 seems fair to me.
Bob, let's be realistic. We both lose if this drags on. I'm willing to come down a bit, but 52/48 is my final offer.
I'm willing to compromise, but I still think I deserve more than half. 58/42 is my new offer.
Bob, this is getting ridiculous. I've lowered my offer, but you're not really gaining anything by delaying. 51/49 is the best you'll get. Take it or leave it.
